thread.title: Lamar Odom’s Belongings Stolen While Unconscious at Bunny Ranch
thread.title_full: Lamar Odom’s Belongings Stolen While Unconscious at Bunny Ranch

author: Jordan Chariton
title: Lamar Odom’s Belongings Stolen While Unconscious at Bunny Ranch
text:
Lamar Odom’s Belongings Stolen While Unconscious at Bunny Ranch TheWrap 3 hrs ago Jordan Chariton © David Liam Kyle/NBAE via Getty Images Lamar Odom As Lamar Odom was unconscious at a Nevada brother, a mystery man came in and took his cell phone and belongings.
AdChoices Bunny Ranch owner Dennis Hof told the New York Post a man entered Odom's room and jacked his personal items. Another man who claimed to be Odom's bodyguard later came and told Hof he had no clue who the first person was.
"I don't know if I got conned," Hof said. "I think when this all shakes out, this a shaky (expletive). I didn't recognize him. Something was up."
Odom continued making progress over the weekend; he was speaking sentences and is "doing good," sources told the Los Angeles Times.
He's been visited by former teammates including Kobe Bryant, Blake Griffin , DeAndre Jordan and Chris Paul.
"He probably has no idea we were there, but just to be there and to see him -- hopefully he knows there's a lot of guys that love him and want to see him do better and want to see him get better," Griffin said before the Clippers' Saturday practice.
